website_summaries.verdict: If using natural products that are made with animal-friendly, eco-conscious practices is important to you, this stain is the one to choose.
pros: Stands out for the natural formula that uses fruit and vegetable ingredients to create a beautiful stain
Doesn't contain chemical additives and can be used on the lips and cheeks
cons: Flavor is on the bitter side
We love that the packaging is environmentally-friendly, but it feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several lip stains and non actually seem to stain the way I want. This is the first one I've found that works well the way I want. I don't like having to reapply make up all day. I put this on in the morning and once it's dried I apply vitamin e chip stick on throughout the day and the stain stays fading slightly but still leaves a hint of color.
customer_reviews.author: Rejoice Stropnicky

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday vibrant lip tint
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s like a happy medium between a lip tint and a lip stick. It’s moisturizing like a balm, but with more color. It doesn’t last super long, especially when eating or drinking, but I don’t mind. It doesn’t leave a bad residue as it starts to wear off, so it still looks good when you reapply a few times a day. I have it in a couple colors. Highly recommend if you’re looking to brighten up your lips without being overly dramatic. Hint: when first using, it takes like 30 clicks to get the color to saturate the applicator sponge - don’t give up haha.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Pope

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed in this product. I have exceptionally dry lips and am always on the lookout for a product that provides moisture and color. I read about Revlon's Kiss Cushion Lip Tint in an online beauty article. The reviewer gave it excellent reviews and I thought it the answer to my quest. Unfortunately, that's not the case for me. It provides almost no moisturizing effect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Dworkin

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking color. Love the feel of it too.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color (mauve)! Looks so natural. It goes on creamy but dries in a few mins. Feels a bit too dry after so I would use some lip balm after. I do have pretty dry lips though so that could be a factor. Color stayed on well.
customer_reviews.author: dineeta

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love lip stains. They stay longer on my lips without having to constantly reapply. This one is a good color for me (naughty mauve). It's not fire engine red and not too pale. The first couple applications it looked too pink, but after twisting up the stain more the color became more true. It does fade some over the day, but not terribly. This is not a moisturizing product at all, but it doesn't dry out my lips like other long wear lip products I've tried. I just hope they keep making it
customer_reviews.author: Hope Russell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A little bit more matte than I expected, it's not sticky and goes on easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cowger

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I bought it on a whim after seeing an ad and it surpassed expectation by far. It is much more pigmented than I thought it would be, which is fine. It is so smooth, it feels more like a lip gel than anything. No stickiness at all. The only downside is the slightly cheap makeup smell it has, but I'm really impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, not dry
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something easy that I could wear when I don’t feel like wearing actual lipstick, for like a “whatever” day. This was perfect! I bought 4 colors and love them all! They’re the perfect tint and have some moisture so they literally don’t dry out on my lips. It feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, not dry
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something easy that I could wear when I don’t feel like wearing actual lipstick, for like a “whatever” day. This was perfect! I bought 4 colors and love them all! They’re the perfect tint and have some moisture so they literally don’t dry out on my lips. It feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Have bought four of these now...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought four colors of this lipstick and really like it. The texture is good (feels like chapstick rather than lipstick or gloss) and it seems moisturizing. It is easy to apply and goes on pretty smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, not dry
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something easy that I could wear when I don’t feel like wearing actual lipstick, for like a “whatever” day. This was perfect! I bought 4 colors and love them all! They’re the perfect tint and have some moisture so they literally don’t dry out on my lips. It feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the cushion top very much. Tried other colors but the pink irl is all i can wear. Other colors are too bright and bold for me, but if you like that, try them.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly...

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It’s moisturizing a bit and adds color but I feel comfortable using it without a mirror. Not the longest lasting tint but very useable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: A lot of mixed reviews but I really like this lip product. Not a stain and doesn’t last very long but very flattering and I have yet to meet a long lasting lipstick anyway. Ignore the complaint about making it work, just click the collar a few times and there is no problem. The taste is fine not unpleasant and both the wine color and rose color are fine. It’s lipstick after all, what more can you expect???
customer_reviews.author: Lynnz

customer_reviews.title: Color not lasting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Fancy rose/ rose chic and I love the colour but it's very greasy- almost like a lipgloss and not at all a lip tint because as soon as you put it on it wears off. If you put it on and sneeze the color is gone, if you drink water- it's gone. If you're walking through a slight breeze- guess what? Colour is gone. Long story short: the "lip tint" really doesn't last at all and you constantly have to be rubbing it on. Save your money and invest somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Magenta Stain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the color Berry Lit and am loving the bright magenta color. (Now that all of my meetings are on zoom calls, I look a bit more polished without having to do much. :) Also - it's bright but not a crazy color on my medium caucasian skin.) It wears down to a nice stain and I like the oily texture when applying. I wouldn't say it could replace a chapstick if your lips are super dry but have already reordered in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: High end coral is orange
customer_reviews.text: Smooth application but the high end coral is more like pumpkin orange. Wish I had tried a different color I will never wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia's mom

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use issue
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to apply. Not just for me but clearly others as there are several searches on line for how to apply it. You should not need a tutorial for lip stain - its just not that complicated? I can never seem to get the product to come out and its frustrating. There are other stains out there that don't have this issue - utilize those instead. Maybe they will change the design if enough people stop using it due to application complications.
customer_reviews.author: Caramelbelle

customer_reviews.title: Color is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Color is amazing, and bold. The style and mechanism of this product is very different. But i like it. Rubs on very softly and color stays on for hours!! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t bad but it isn’t what I’m looking for. It goes on very easily, I like that. I just didn’t like that it came off so easily. The sponge head is a little too large for precise lines at lip edge. I think it would work well for someone young and just learning how to use lip cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: Gracefully Metal

customer_reviews.title: Unique but I like it...Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint Lipstick, Wine Trip
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an applicator like this before. But so far, I really like it. It's gives tint and color but you don't get the stickiness of a gloss this way. So far the only drawback I can see is that the applicator sponge area is rather large and somewhat imprecise. But with practice I am getting better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: nice gloss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be more like a lip stain. It's not. It is a cross between a lipstick and a gloss. And it doesn't seem to stay on long, but that may be because I have a tendency to lick my lips. All that being said, these come in really nice colors (I have 5). They feel smooth and I like they way they go on. I wish the sponge tip was a little more narrow though, so application is more defined. But overall, these are really nice and I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dimock

customer_reviews.title: I wish it actually lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the color of this on me! But the problem is, it never dries. I kept it on and didn't touch it for 20+ minutes and it wiped off like it was just put on. Other similar products dry within 5 minutes. I really, really wish this lasted like it claims. At least now I know the perfect shade for me and can hopefully find it in a true long-wear version!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: the holy grail for lip color!
customer_reviews.text: Just right, not gooey, not matte, not gloss....feels fab, and looks great! I have 3 colors
customer_reviews.author: Clarity143

customer_reviews.title: Good tint lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this tint lipstick you do have to re apply from time to time I lick my off all the time, the color is nice and it does moisturize my lips, easy and smooth to apply, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nini59

customer_reviews.title: Not the color pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is not the color pictured at ALL. I read the reviews of people saying it was more of a brown/nude tint than pink, but figured it was worth a try for the price. Don’t make the same mistake. I got this, tried it on, and it went right in the trash. I understand colors may looks lightly different on a screen than in real life, but this was t even close.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twist Slowly & Be Patient
customer_reviews.text: It's different than other lipsticks. It takes a long while to start it, but you do NOT want too much to come out at once, so TWIST SLOWLY and BE PATIENT. My first one went through the wash and though I had to throw it away, I was thankful NONE came out of its container. Immediately bought same color.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMarie113

customer_reviews.title: Loving the subtlety
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the fancy Rose and I was nervous up until it finally arrived. After clicking for probably 90 seconds, color appeared and I applied excitedly. I was shocked at how well it went with my skin tone. It's basically my natural lip color and just evened the tone. I'm a 40 year young black woman, my lips are beginning to get darker and uneven in pigment - which is annoying. This color is ideal and after wiping it off, some tiny still remains and I like that. That means that even as it wears off, I can take my time before I have to reapply. It's not at all moisturizing so I apply a base coat of lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie W.

customer_reviews.title: Mine does not work
customer_reviews.text: Just like a couple videos that are posted...mine will not produce any color no matter what I do. I know it was a special price but I didn't buy it to be a prop.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stainer
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Goes on very dark though and wet. Hard to build up. Blotting is necessary for the moisture but will reduce the color be aware. Not bad though. Happy with it. The twist pen is really not that bad and almost I think necessary, because the color is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee

customer_reviews.title: One time purchase
customer_reviews.text: Less pigmented than expected. On my lip color it looks like a regular gloss with no pigmentation. Probably won't purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: RuzI

customer_reviews.title: Different color than it’s supposed to be!
customer_reviews.text: It was not the right color in the tube. I regularly buy this shade at target but the one that I got from this store was much, much darker and had a dark brown shade. It’s like they sold me one that was ‘bottled’ incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: io

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last but applys soft and taste is good
customer_reviews.text: Its good that the flavor is good and it feels soft to apply but its more sheer than i had imagined and its gone in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing comes out. I twisted it and nothing comes out. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Total bummer.
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is awful. The lip tint leaks out the sides of the wand making a very messy application. The color is lovely but good luck getting it to last more than 15 minutes. Bummer because I wanted to love this lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: Paradigm Shift in Lipstick, but fun!
customer_reviews.text: So cool! You talk about a paradigm shift in lipstick. If you have to wait a little longer than normal to crank it to get started, it is worth it. I find it kind of fun!
customer_reviews.author: mrs_belle

customer_reviews.title: New favorite lip color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It goes on smooth, lasts several hours, and the color is super flattering on my tan colored skin. It doesn't make my lips peel or feel dry. And the price I got it for (less than $5) was a steal! Win win win!
customer_reviews.author: DPS

customer_reviews.title: nah
customer_reviews.text: thought it would b more sheer, its kind of like lip stain without the staying power. Can't really control the color it comes out as u twist but full on, had to spread with finger then blot for lighter color
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stain your lips; applicator doesn't allow precision.
customer_reviews.text: Found this product after doing some searching for affordable lip stains. It was highly suggested, but I'm disappointed. I like the color, but it doesn't stay for long - even for a lipstick, much less a lip stain. The pigment seems to sit on the surface of the lips (I tried giving the application time to set, then wiping off the excess - but most of the "stain" wiped off as well). The applicator does not allow for precision, either. This product isn't awful, but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J Hansen

customer_reviews.title: The balm stains are much better
customer_reviews.text: The wear time isn't very long and it tends to collect on the edges of the lips. The color is a caramel-maybe and doesn't show too well if your lips are pigmented. Personally it looked cute for 30 minutes for me...but if you like the lip lined look with the smell of vanilla baked goods, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kimthy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was hoping for but it isn't bad at all. I don't notice any lip stain qualities as some people have mentioned but maybe it's just too close to my natural color. Either way, it's still a nice color and pretty good as long as you are prepared for the applicator
customer_reviews.author: Jenny 81

customer_reviews.title: Love this tint!  Buy all the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a tint. You don't have to apply much. After the initial application wears off, you still have the hint of color for hours. I loved it so much, I went back and bought most of every color.
customer_reviews.author: redbull

customer_reviews.title: Can easily do without
customer_reviews.text: Feels good for 2 min. Nice colors. Very difficult to apply which is weird because the applicator seems like it would work well, but for some odd reason it seems to just smear it on. I won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The color is perfect it's like fuchsia and pink and purple at the same time and it moisturizes your lips at the same time as color and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink color boost- really works.
customer_reviews.text: love it, although it stains throughout the time you're using it, & reapplying. I like the 'Berry Lit' color the most. I've also bout a red color, but I dont like it as much. Looks more Natural with the pink color once it stains. My lips are pink, not red. hashtag--'Berry Lit' 4 Life!🤣
customer_reviews.author: RoxyB.

customer_reviews.title: Good colors.  Kind of moisturizing.  Color doesn’t last at all.
customer_reviews.text: Why don’t the manufacturers make a long wearing and moisturizing lipstick ? I need both. This is a good design. The colors are good. It moisturizes kind of but it doesn’t last. Really doesn’t last!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnz

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh, definitely ORANGE not coral
customer_reviews.text: The coral color was traffic stopping orange. I sent it back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Coconutty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These colors are all great. For being some moisturizing it is surprisingly long-lasting. It wears off evenly and it's easy to apply. It was happily surprised by this
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the way it applies. Does not leave my lips dry or Camry looking like most lipsticks. This is my new favorite, I have 2 colors and love them both!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great lip stain!
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from the previous version. I love the way it applies and how well the stain lasts. Great application. I love it. And doesn't dry out my lips at all.
customer_reviews.author: H. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Cross between a balm and lipstain
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cross between a balm and a lip stain. Gives your lips a blushed glow. Lasts about as long as a lip balm would. No offputting smells or textures.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: New staple lip color
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go to. I am not sure how long it lasts but I like that it adds color and moisture and lasts a little longer than my Pacifica tinted lip balm. Will by more in future. This color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply. Doesn’t last as long as other lip stains.
customer_reviews.text: Great color, easy to apply, moisturizing. Color doesn’t last nearly as long as a traditional lip stain.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Montes

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this color! It took me a little bit to figure out how to get the color out. You just keep twisting it! I like the color!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: So natural so beautiful, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! So natural , perfect tint. Will buy another again
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shade! Very moisturizing on the the lips and no cracks!
customer_reviews.author: Genebe

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing lip tint
customer_reviews.text: This is a very moisturizing long lasting lip tint. It adore this product and have a couple different shades, there are so many flattering colors!
customer_reviews.author: Allie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great color,a bit drying
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, goes on smooth and can layer for richer color. The only drawback is after a bit you notice your lips feel dry and you have to reach for your balm.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice color.
customer_reviews.text: I love this color & it goes on smooth. It didn’t last as long as I thought it would but for the price, it was great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I had to look up how to use it. Had to turn the top 10 plus times. I’m not sure if it dried up quickly or if the turning mechanism quit working. It went on wet but then was dry. I did like the color but probably won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Not as moisturizing as I thought. Doesn’t blend well so can’t put on blindly. Must take a peek in mirror. But I use it. Likely won’t buy again but not an awful product
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Read a review that said it was difficult to get the color out. Once I got the color started, I didn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'v e been twisting, waiting and dabbing for hours....wth!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been hours since I've received item, still waiting for the magic to come forth....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but lacks in longevity. Wears off real fast, is a bit thick and sticky. Good value for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa English

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this looking for a new lip stain. I have no idea if the stain is good or not as the product I received is either empty or just completely faulty. I kept pressing the dispenser trying to get product out until it snapped......and still no product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Litsinger

customer_reviews.title: Eh, Another Drugstore brand.
customer_reviews.text: Another cheap drugstore brand. I had to twist for a longggg while before I got any color. Not a fan of the applicator. I'd just stick to a different lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: MOLD in two products
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product besides one key thing. I have bought this many times and the last two times I purchased the lip tint went bad in only a couple weeks and I could taste MOLD. It’s the last thing I want to put on my lips or taste in my mouth. I don’t know if it’s the design of the product or the formula, but either way, it needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This product just didn’t work for me. It wore off too fast, in fact, it was gone after a cup of coffee, but it was moisturizing, and the color was lovely.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Wish the product actually lasted longer, really loved the color. Returned to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Lama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great lip tint . Lasts good few hours and smudge free. Can kiss husband and kids not leaving lip print behind
customer_reviews.author: Avi2014

customer_reviews.title: Lip tint
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Very easy to apply to my lips
customer_reviews.author: Susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a tint. Waste of money for a dark POC
customer_reviews.author: Olivia A

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice on the lips
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of lip color. It's easy to use with the builtin sponge application. It's a softer hue.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleKitty17

customer_reviews.title: Gloss. Not a tint. pass.
customer_reviews.text: Purely a gloss. Not a tint. I don’t know why it’s called a tiny. It’s a very glossy color. Pretty pigmented but doesn’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Saw this in a magazine and purchased several. I really like it as it has good moisture and keeps the color
customer_reviews.author: Annatha

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: For a wedding. I did not want to worry about my lipstick wearing off. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: E. Swim

customer_reviews.title: Hopeless
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you try to do, shake, press or hold down as advised in these reviews, this is the worst design of a lipstick ever made. You will see some color on the sponge but it simply does not work as a lipstick (or even give you a slight moisture or color) and I could not use it as there is no liquid that comes out of the sponge pen/ nozzle. Utter failure and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer, New York

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: This liptint is moisturizing and the color is not heavy and thick, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizeing
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to stain my lips a bit really it's a golly it's cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Danny Emel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shade lip tint. Affordable,long lasting and moisturize lips well
customer_reviews.author: Genebe

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: Moisturising lips and flattering it also last longer that other lip tint that i use
customer_reviews.author: Genebe

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in the case
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the product had dried up or just wasn't in the container, but my stain was a no show
customer_reviews.author: Roso

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED with these. I have so many colors they are everything
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not super long wear
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and kept lips softer than other long lasting claim products. Color is perfect and not overpowering. I didn't feel it lasted much longer than an hour or two but this is my problem when wearing any lip color.
customer_reviews.author: K Knowles

customer_reviews.title: crimson feels is amazing
customer_reviews.text: this is probably the best color out of the collection! Crimson feels , get it !
customer_reviews.author: amanda mas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color..
customer_reviews.text: Nice natural color however, it is very drying to my lips. I must use lip moisturizer after application.
customer_reviews.author: grahamcracker

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This tint lip last a long time and it does not dry my lips
customer_reviews.author: adela gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: No flavor or anything. Not really moisturizing either but it’s a lip tint and it does it’s job. The color is very pleasing and depending on how much you apply, you can make it look natural to bright red
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's not really made to last on your lips all day but it's super moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Russell

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and long lasting lippy
customer_reviews.text: It's a creamy luscious lippy I like it . I even recommended it to my sisters. I'm sure they will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good lip Product
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturising color doesn't last long but for the price you can't not try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The applicator tip is so big it's impossible to put the lip stain on right.
customer_reviews.author: MommaB

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: It goes on shiny but in a short time it dries out and your lips start to sting. I should have paid more attention to the other reviewers who said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: AreKay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: It gave no tint to the lips Not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Griffin-Day

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LIPSTICK! It stays on and holds color!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much! The color is not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Flattering lip stuff - half gloss, half lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Love how it goes on, flattering color, long lasting. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: charles patrick

customer_reviews.title: Coconut shine
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I went back and bought 2 of each color! They look great on and stay on forever.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, not too bold. Color stays on well past the “glossy” feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Grise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, no bad smell, no bad cracking. Easy to moisturize over. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

product_meta.title: Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint Lipstick, High End Coral
product_meta.description: Color:High End CoralPlush tip for a lush lip! Revlon's Kiss Cushion Lip Tint features a soft cushion tip applicator that delivers a juicy wash of color in three easy steps! Step 1: Twist collar under the cushion to release the tint formula. Step 2: Wait a few seconds for the tint to saturate the cushion. Step 3: Dab on lips for a tinted juicy look. Available in 10 kissable shades! Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon's products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.
feature_bullets: The look of a stain with the feel of a balm.
Hybrid formula infused with coconut oil so lips feel moisturized and smooth.
Pillowy soft cushion tip gives a touch of color and builds for more impact.
Juicy tint with a balm-like finish.
Dries to a blotted lip look.
